content.query:
SELECT sc.name, t.name AS TableName, SUM(p.rows) AS [RowCount] 
FROM sys.tables AS t INNER JOIN sys.partitions AS p ON t.object_id = p.object_id 
inner join sys.schemas sc on t.schema_id=sc.schema_id
WHERE t.is_ms_shipped = 0 AND p.index_id IN (1, 0) GROUP BY sc.name,t.name
 


 select count(*)
 from gold.SalesForceJsonData
